thread.title: 'Zoom in on the Dog's Nose' Is the Internet's Favorite Happy Meme
thread.title_full: 'Zoom in on the Dog's Nose' Is the Internet's Favorite Happy Meme

author: Anonymous
title: 'Zoom in on the Dog's Nose' Is the Internet's Favorite Happy Meme
text:
Tweet Posted: Tue, 2/28/2017 - 8:33pm by Cat Pajamas 
Lots of memes are used to express sarcasm or throw shade in one way or another, which is why those occasional nice, happy memes are so gosh darn refreshing. The latest in the nice/happy meme trend comes courtesy of Daniel Alexander, known on Twitter as @SNCKPCK , who came up with the "Zoom in on the Dog's Nose" meme, where users zoom in on a picture of a dog's nose to find a clue to look somewhere else on the picture, to find another clue that eventually leads to a sweet, complimentary message. Take a look at some of the first iterations of the new meme below... 
NOTE: This works SO MUCH BETTER ON MOBILE zoom in on the dog nose pic.twitter.com/5Kjlq1w2PX 
— snck ★彡 (@SNCKPCK) February 25, 2017 zoom into the dog nose pic.twitter.com/DjHG0QhGw9 
— snck ★彡 (@SNCKPCK) February 25, 2017 zoom into the dog nose pic.twitter.com/wcULeRqhic 
— snck ★彡 (@SNCKPCK) February 26, 2017 zoom into the dog nose pic.twitter.com/ViCBT1K2Fz 
— snck ★彡 (@SNCKPCK) February 25, 2017 
It didn't take long for imitators to follow suit, with some abandoning the positivity theme and opting for more jokey-endings. zoom in on the dogs nose :) lol pic.twitter.com/NZxv6KTnJa 
— eric turtle (@dubstep4dads) February 28, 2017 zoom in on the dog's nose pic.twitter.com/qgSZaWcYIE
